title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Problem-Solving Course Based on Astronomical Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental astronomy concepts and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can design collaborative strategies to analyze complex celestial phenomena using astronomy simulations.
Learners can efficiently coordinate joint attention with peers by utilizing multimodalities (voice, gestures, simulation manipulation).
Learning groups can discuss conceptual errors arising during simulation data interpretation and propose collaborative problem-solving approaches.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
